title: Input schema for the apify_project actor.

testSpec.title: Test spec
testSpec.description: Write your tests here like you would in a .spec jasmine file. Refer to the README for matchers information

defaultTimeout.title: Default timeout
defaultTimeout.description: Changes the default timeout for each individual test, in milliseconds. Defaults to 5 minutes

filter.title: Filter tests
filter.description: You can filter tests providing their names here
